name: SOREAL
description:
"This arcade seems so real, so real..."

SHOOT THE ENEMIES FOR POINTS! MAXIMUM POINTS, MAXIMUM FUN!

"Maybe I'll have a quick game..."

Controls:

  • Left Click: Attack
  • Right Click: Throw Weapon
  • Control Player with WASD
  • Control Camera with Mouse

(Psssst. If you ever feel like something is impossible. Don't. You know what they say, "Nothing is impossible when you press either Z, C or V. This may come with consequences, however.")
